SEARCH
Package servlets

Interface Servlet

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfLoader, GraphRefresher, HtmlLoader, TopicDisplayer, TopicValidator
public interface Servlet
Servlet interface defines the contract for handling HTTP requests in the server. Implementations should process the request and write the response to the output stream.

Example implementation: 


 public class UserServlet implements Servlet {
     {@literal @}Override
     public void handle(RequestInfo ri, OutputStream toClient) throws IOException {
         PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(toClient, true);
         writer.println("HTTP/1.1 200 OK");
         writer.println("Content-Type: application/json");
         writer.println();
         writer.println("{\"users\": []}");
     }
     
     {@literal @}Override
     public void close() throws IOException {
         // Clean up resources
     }
 }

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes the servlet and releases any resources it holds.
    void
    handle(RequestParser.RequestInfo ri, OutputStream toClient)
    Handles an HTTP request and writes the response to the client.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      void handle(RequestParser.RequestInfo ri, OutputStream toClient) throws IOException
      Handles an HTTP request and writes the response to the client.
      Parameters:
      ri - the parsed request information including URI, headers, and body
      toClient - the output stream to write the HTTP response to
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the request or response

    • close

      void close() throws IOException
      Closes the servlet and releases any resources it holds. Called when the servlet is being removed or the server is shutting down.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while closing resources
